mapper.insert:
insert into items_comments ( id, user_id, item_id, item_name, item_spec_id, spec_name, comment_level, content, created_time, updated_time ) values
( #{item.commentId}, #{userId}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemSpecId}, #{item.itemSpecName}, #{item.commentLevel}, #{item.content}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT ic.id AS commentId, ic.content AS content, ic.created_time AS createdTime, ic.item_id AS itemId, ic.item_name AS itemName, ic.spec_name AS specName, ii.url AS itemImg FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON ic.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE ic.user_id = #{userId} AND ii.is_main = 1 ORDER BY ic.updated_time DESC
